original_title: When My Sorrow Died: The Story of Armen Ra and The Theremin
overview: Glamorously eccentric and enigmatic Theremin master Armen Ra recounts his dynamic journey in this life-spanning documentary that mixes rare concert performances, candid interviews, and archive material with the magical power of music that can alchemize ancient sorrow into timeless beauty.
tagline: The documentary follows Armenâ€™s triumphant return engagement, and ultimately, an expression of beauty and the death of his sorrow.
title: When My Sorrow Died: The Story of Armen Ra and The Theremin
